Something for the next MR
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2012 Topics: Something for the next MR
By OgreBattle on Saturday, July 7, 2012 - 04:17 pm:

So, in MR3, the subtypes of monsters are their regions. In every other MR (which takes place in the future--seems like the order goes 3 -> 1 -> 2 -> 4 -> EVO -> DS), a monster's subtype is another monster, because combining exists--and, presumably, saucer stones are read differently.

In the next MR sequel, what if a monster's subtype could -also- be of a region correspondent to that game (say it could be Durahan/Papas, etc), and that those regional subtype monsters are gotten from doing a ton of errantries in that location, or by special saucer stones (Ice Stone, etc)?

Just a thought.
